div.h2: CARIN RTPBC Pharmacy Type Value Setf

div.p: This value set contains a subset of two-letter ISO 3166-1-2 country codes for the countries in which this profile is intended to be used (US and CA).
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in urn:iso:std:iso:3166
CodeDisplay
USUnited States of America
CACanada

title.value: CARIN RTPBC Pharmacy Type Value Setf

description.value: This value set contains a subset of two-letter ISO 3166-1-2 country codes for the countries in which this profile is intended to be used (US and CA).
